titles.title: Electing officers of the House of Representatives.
Electing officers of the House of Representatives.

action.text: Ms. Cheney demanded that the question be divided on the adoption of the resolution so as to have a separate vote on the election of Chaplain. Agreed to without objection.
On agreeing to that portion electing the Chaplain Agreed to by voice vote.
On agreeing to remainder of the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution elects the following officers of the House of Representatives: (1) Karen L. Haas as Clerk, (2) Paul D. Irving as Sergeant at Arms, (3) Philip George Kiko as Chief Administrative Officer, and (4) Father Patrick J. Conroy as Chaplain.
